title: Picky Relics
description:
This mod is just like Bossy Relics, but configurable. Relic rewards will provide one choice out of many.

Configurable from 0 to 5 choices for each type of relic. You can also choose if relics have a chance to be higher or lower tier than the original.

---

There are 18 ai-generated language localizations, although the text is mostly just labels in the config menus. Any translation corrections are welcome!
